```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(tsibble)
library(ggplot2)
df=read.csv("History.csv")

df$month <- as.Date(paste0(df$month, "01"), format = "%Y%m%d")
data=df%>%group_by(state)%>%filter(state=="Iowa")
data

ggplot(data, aes(x = month, y = median_days_on_market)) +
  geom_line() +
  scale_x_date(breaks = "1 year", date_labels = "%Y") +
  facet_wrap(~state) +
  labs(x = "Year", y = "median_days_on_market") +
  ggtitle("Seasonal Plot of Median listing Price")+
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, vjust = 0.5))
```
